pages.text: $(li)The Dark Forest is a temperate forested biome with dense leaf canopies that block light sufficiently to allow hostile creatures to appear even during the daytime. $(br)$(li)This biome can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find Maple trees, Dark Oak Trees, giant Red and Brown mushrooms.

$(li)Some animals like $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/raccoon)Raccoons$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/deer)Deer$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Dark Forest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
